WorkItem.Description:
Can you please add a way for us to disable the little pop up message that tells you what to do next in order to get details in EnhSim
Maybe a check box that says "Don't show me this again" Not a major issue but damn its annoying when I am creating configs, copying and paste dozens of times.
Thanks again for all the work you do on Rawr.
WorkItem.Summary: [Feature Request.Enhance] Export Stats to EnhSim config file button
